abstract: For hot technology companies, from Google to Instagram, the decision of when to sell — if ever — is sometimes painful, balancing the uncertainty of the future versus the fear of getting out of a good thing too early.
snippet: For hot technology companies, from Google to Instagram, the decision of when to sell — if ever — is sometimes painful, balancing the uncertainty of the future versus the fear of getting out of a good thing too early.
lead_paragraph: 6:26 p.m. | Updated It is a question that every successful start-up faces: When to cash out?

headline.main: The Instagram Deal and the Question of When to Sell

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
